attributes.action: Ban the use of music through mobile phones on public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel it is anti-social the way people play music on their mobile phones and mp3 players on public transport that disturbs other commuters. It often contains swear words that not everybody wants to listen to.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
